data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Gopalganj, Bihar, India.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gopalganj, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Gopalganj to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord, let it be said of the 2,533,818 lost in Gopalganj that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Gopalganj prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 2,502,732 who are far from you in Gopalganj, Bihar, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Gopalganj, Bihar, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Gopalganj, Bihar, India has a population of 2,562,000.

We estimate Gopalganj has 28,182 people who might know Jesus, 31,086 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,502,732 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Gopalganj, Bihar, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
